CustomField.description: This person is responsbile for reviewing and approving the ticket. Once all artifacts are attached, deployment resource is assigned and development review occurs (if needed) and the ticket is sumbitted to the reviewer, this is who it goes to.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This person is responsbile for reviewing and approving the ticket. Once all artifacts are attached, deployment resource is assigned and development review occurs (if needed) and the ticket is sumbitted to the reviewer, this is who it goes to.
CustomField.label: Manager Reviewer
